messages.content: What is the plot of the book "Wool"

Wool is a science fiction novel by Hugh Howey, published in 2011. It is set in a post-apocalyptic world where people live in a silo, an underground structure with an artificial atmosphere that is designed to conserve resources and protect against the dangers of the outside world. The main character, a silo worker named Wool, discovers a forbidden ledger that reveals the truth about the silo's past and the true nature of the outside world. Wool and a small group of silo workers embark on a dangerous journey to the surface to uncover the truth about the world they live in and the future of humanity.
What is the author, publisher, and year of publishing of this book?
Wool was written by Hugh Howey and published by Random House in 2011.
Are you aware of any newer books with this title?
I am not aware of any newer books with the title "Wool" by the same author. However, there may be other books with similar titles or similar themes.
